summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the correct operation of many-to-one (foreign key) relationships in the ORM, exercising related manager actions such as add, remove, set, create, delete, assignment, prefetching, select_related, caching, and handling special cases like lazy translations, big integer primary keys, deepcopy with circular references, and exception scenarios.
business_intent: Provide confidence that many-to-one relationship handling remains reliable and regression‑free by automatically testing a wide range of typical and edge‑case interactions with foreign key related objects.
